body_html:
@av8ramit , I have 1.4.1 and you said that official releases now have .... yet,

When I do:
python3.6 -m pip install --upgrade --user tensorflow

It says that:
Requirement already up-to-date: tensorflow in ./.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages

body:
@av8ramit , I have 1.4.1 and you said that official releases *now* have .... yet,

When I do:
`python3.6 -m pip install --upgrade --user tensorflow`

It says that:
`Requirement already up-to-date: tensorflow in ./.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages`
